crown.name: CSK_Module_MultiRemoteCamera
crown.desc: This is an automatically generated CROWN (description not necessary).

crown.name: CSK_MultiRemoteCamera
crown.desc: Module to provide RemoteCamera configuration functionality. + Multiple instances can be created and image processing will run in multiple threads on the device. + Incoming images can be forwarded to other apps / modules (see "setProcessingMode") + {empty} + **Typical features to use: ** + {empty} + 1) If multiple camera instances are available, selecte a specific camera via "setSelectedInstance" + 2) Set camera IP via "setCameraIP" + 3) Select if GigE Vision camera or not via "setGigEVision" + 4) If it is a GigE Vision camera, select camera model via 'setCameraModel'. + 5) Opt. use set-Function like setResizeFactor, setShutterTime, ... + 6) Set processing mode via "setProcessingMode" + 7) Start camera via "connectCamera" + {empty} + There is also the possibility to edit GigE Vision camera parameters (check also available UI). +

enum.name: CameraModel
enum.desc: Camera type. For some camera models it will internally use some predefined GigE Vision parameters. Otherwise use 'Custom'.

item.desc: Use SICK Pico/MidiCam2 specific GigE Vision parameters.
item.name: SICK_Gen2

item.desc: Use Basler a2A1920-51gc specific GigE Vision parameters.
item.name: Basler

item.desc: Only custom GigE Vision config will be used. No camera / device specific predefined settings.
item.name: Custom

item.desc: Acquire images from SEC100 via HTTP / Websocket.
item.name: SEC100

enum.name: ProcessingMode
enum.desc: Processing in same module or in another app.

item.desc: 'SCRIPT'+'APP' (e.g. you want to process the image within the internal script but would like to show the image also in another app).
item.name: BOTH

item.desc: Handle image only in this module.
item.name: SCRIPT

item.desc: Forward incoming images as event, so that other apps/modules can handle them.
item.name: APP

enum.name: AcquisitionMode
enum.desc: Acquisition / trigger mode of the camera.

item.desc: Software trigger (e.g. via UI button or incoming command like TCPIP command).
item.name: SOFTWARE_TRIGGER

item.desc: Continuous image acquisition with fixed framerate.
item.name: FIXED_FREQUENCY

event.name: OnNewGain
event.desc: Notify gain of currently selected camera instance.

event.name: OnNewShutterTime
event.desc: Notify shutter time of currently selected camera instance.

event.name: OnNewFramerate
event.desc: Notify framerate of currently selected camera instance.

event.name: OnNewResizeFactor
event.desc: Notify resize factor of internal image processing function of currently selected camera.

event.name: OnNewAcquisitionMode
event.desc: Notify acquisition mode of currently selected camera.

event.name: OnNewFOVX
event.desc: Notify field of view in x-direction of currently selected camera.

event.name: OnNewFOVY
event.desc: Notify field of view in y-direction of currently selected camera.

event.name: OnSWTriggerActive
event.desc: Notify if SOFTWARE_TRIGGER camera mode is active (e.g. to visualize relevant UI elements).

event.name: OnNewHardwareTriggerDelay
event.desc: Notify hardware trigger delay of currently selected camera instance.

event.name: OnHWTriggerActive
event.desc: Notify if hardware trigger is active for currently selected camera.

event.name: OnCameraConnected
event.desc: Notify camera connection status.

event.name: OnScanCamera
event.desc: Notify if scanning for connected camera is active.

event.name: OnNewIPCheck
event.desc: Notify if inserted IP has correct format.

event.name: OnCurrentCameraIP
event.desc: Notify IP of currently selected camera.

event.name: OnNewSelectedCam
event.desc: Notify no. of currently selected camera instance.

event.name: OnRegisterCameraNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to register camera intsance to image processing function. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnRegisterCamera1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnDeregisterCameraNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to deregister camera intsance to image processing function. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnDeregisterCamera1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewViewerID
event.desc: Notify currently used viewerID (e.g. to show correct viewer in UI).

event.name: OnNewImageProcessingParameter
event.desc: Event to share processing parameters to the instances.

param.desc: Number of the instance to receive the parameter.
param.name: cameraNo

event.name: OnNewImageCameraNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to transfer incoming image of camera instance. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewImageCamera1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

param.desc: Timestamp is created directly after module received new image.
param.name: timestamp

event.name: OnNewStatusDigitalTriggerPause
event.desc: Notify if digital trigger input should be ignored for currently selected camera instance. (e.g. used to freeze/inspect latest incoming image).

event.name: OnNewGigEVisionStatus
event.desc: Notify if currently selected camera is GigEVision.

event.name: OnNewGigEVisionParameters
event.desc: Notify available GigEVision parameter list received from connected camera.

event.name: OnNewColorMode
event.desc: Notify color mode of currently selected camera.

event.name: OnPersistentDataModuleAvailable
event.desc: Notify status if features of CSK_PersistentData module are available.

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module for currently selected camera instance.

event.name: OnNewGigEVisionCurrentParameter
event.desc: Notify currently selected GigEVision parameter name to edit.

event.name: OnNewGigEVisionParameterType
event.desc: Notify type of currently selected GigEVision parameter.

event.name: OnNewGigEVisionValue
event.desc: Notify value of currently selected GigEVision parameter.

event.name: OnNewSavingImagesPath
event.desc: Notify path to save images of currently selected camera.

event.name: OnNewLoggingMessage
event.desc: Notify latest logging message of this module.

event.name: OnNewStatusTempImageActive
event.desc: Notify if latest image of currently selected camera instance should be temporarily be saved to store them eventually.

event.name: OnNewImageQueueCamera
event.desc: Notify queue size of module internal image processing function of currently selected camera.

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app/device boot up.

event.name: OnNewFPSCamera
event.desc: Notify latest calculated FPS of currently selected camera.

event.name: OnNewStatusViewerActive
event.desc: Notify if UI viewer of currently selected camera instance should show image.

event.name: OnNewCameraOverviewTable
event.desc: Notify content for camera overview in UI.

event.name: OnNewProcessingMode
event.desc: Notify processing mode of currently selected camera.

event.name: OnNewCameraList
event.desc: Notify list of camera instances.

event.name: OnNewStatusSaveAllImagesActive
event.desc: Notify if all images should be saved.

event.name: OnNewImageFilePrefix
event.desc: Notify image file prefix to use.

event.name: OnNewValueToForwardNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to Forward thread internal values to e.g. be notified with single event related to UI. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewValueToForward1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewImageSaveFormat
event.desc: Notify format to save images.

event.name: OnNewFormatCompression
event.desc: Notify value of compression for image compression.

param.desc: INFO: Depends on format (see AppEngine function Image.save).
param.name: compression

event.name: OnNewMonitoringState
event.desc: Notify if currently selected camera is available or not.

event.name: OnNewSwitchMode
event.desc: Notify if currently selected camera is in SwitchMode.

event.name: OnNewMonitoring
event.desc: Notify if currently selected camera is monitored.

event.name: OnNewMonitoringStateCams
event.desc: Notify if the cameras is available or not.

event.name: OnNewGigEVisionTableContent
event.desc: Notify list of available GigE Vision parameters (for UI table view).

event.name: OnNewGigEVisionConfigTableContent
event.desc: Notify list of custom GigE Vision configs (for UI table view).

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewCameraModel
event.desc: Camera-Model which is connected. Like Midicam2 or Basler-Camera.

event.name: OnNewNumberOfCameras
event.desc: Notify number of camera instances.

event.name: OnNewImageSizeToShare
event.desc: Notify if image size changed to other modules.

event.name: OnNewStatusWaitingForCameraBootUp
event.desc: Notify if module is curently waiting for camera boot up.

event.name: OnNewStatusCustomCamera
event.desc: Notify if camera model 'Custom' is selected.

event.name: OnNewSWTriggerEvent
event.desc: Notify event to trigger camera if in SW mode.

event.name: OnNewStatusFlowConfigPriority
event.desc: Notify if FlowConfig should have priority for FlowConfig relevant configurations.

event.name: OnNewStatusCSKStyle
event.desc: Notify UI style to use for CSK modules.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleVersion
event.desc: Notify version of module.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleIsActive
event.desc: Notify if module can be used on device.

event.name: OnNewImagePoolSize
event.desc: Notfiy image pool size to use for camera.

event.name: OnNewCameraType
event.desc: Notify type of camera.

event.name: OnNewHTTPClientInstance
event.desc: Notify instance of CSK_MultiHTTPClient module to use for SEC100 camera connection.

event.name: OnNewUsernameSEC
event.desc: Notify username to login to SEC camera.

event.name: OnNewStatusSECMode
event.desc: Notify mode to run SEC camera.

event.name: OnNewWebSocketClientInstance
event.desc: Notify instance of WebSocket client to use for SEC stream.

event.name: OnNewStatusCameraParameters
event.desc: Notify selected camera type to show parameters within UI.

event.name: OnNewPasswordSEC
event.desc: Notify password for SEC user.

event.name: OnNewStatusSECStreamIsActive
event.desc: Notify if SEC stream is currently active.

event.name: OnNewEthernetInterfaceList
event.desc: Notify list of available ethernet interfaces.

event.name: OnNewHTTPClientInterface
event.desc: Notfiy interface of HTTP client to use for SEC connection.

function.name: pageCalled
function.desc: Function to register "OnResume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: emptyString

function.name: setShutterTime
function.desc: Set shutter time of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: setGain
function.desc: Set gain of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: setFramerate
function.desc: Set framerate (in FIXED_FREQUENCY mode) of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: setResizeFactor
function.desc: Set resize factor used in module internal image processing of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: setAcquisitionMode
function.desc: Set acquisition mode of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: setFOVX
function.desc: Set Field of view in x-direction in [pixel] of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance"). + Needs to be activated via "setFOV" after this.

function.name: setFOVY
function.desc: Set Field of view in y-direction in [pixel] of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance"). + Needs to be activated via "setFOV" after this.

function.name: setFOV
function.desc: Activate preconfigured field of view of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: cameraSoftwareTrigger
function.desc: Trigger SW trigger on currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: setHardwareTriggerDelay
function.desc: Set trigger delay (in HARDWARE_TRIGGER mode) used in cFlow of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: connectCamera
function.desc: Connect to currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: setCameraIP
function.desc: Set IP of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: getCameraIP
function.desc: Get IP of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: getAcquisitionMode
function.desc: Get acquisition mode of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: getFramerate
function.desc: Get framerate (in FIXED_FREQUENCY mode) of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: getResizeFactor
function.desc: Get resize factor used in module internal image processing of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: getGain
function.desc: Get gain of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: getShutterTime
function.desc: Get shutter time of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: getHardwareTriggerDelay
function.desc: Get trigger delay (in HARDWARE_TRIGGER mode) used in cFlow of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: getFOVX
function.desc: Get Field of view in x-direction in [pixel] of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: getFOVY
function.desc: Get Field of view in y-direction in [pixel] of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: startCamera
function.desc: Start currently selected camera (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: stopCamera
function.desc: Stop currently selected camera (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: setColorMode
function.desc: Set color mode of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: getColorMode
function.desc: Get color mode of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: setSelectedCam
function.desc: [DEPRECATED] See 'setSelectedInstance'. + Select single camera instance (first select a instance, after that other functions like "set"-function will use this camera instance).

function.name: getSelectedCam
function.desc: Get currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: setDigitalTriggerPause
function.desc: Use preset trigger delay (in HARDWARE_TRIGGER mode) used in cFlow of currently selected camera instance (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: getGigEVision
function.desc: Get info if currently selected camera instance is a GigEVision camera (see "setSelectedInstance").

function.name: setGigEVision
function.desc: Select if currently selected camera instance is a GigEVision camera.

function.name: setParameterName
function.desc: Function to set the name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module.

function.name: sendParameters
function.desc: Send parameters to CSK_PersistentData module if possible to save them.

param.desc: [Optional] Set to TRUE if the data should NOT be saved immediately after sending.
param.name: noDataSave

function.name: setGigEVisionParameterName
function.desc: Set GigEVision ParameterName to add for custom GigE Vision setting (see "addGigEVisionConfig").

function.name: setGigEVisionParameterValue
function.desc: Set GigEVision ParameterValue to add for custom GigE Vision setting (see "addGigEVisionConfig").

function.name: setSavingPath
function.desc: Set path to save images via "saveImage".

function.name: setTempImageActive
function.desc: Set status if images should be temporarily be saved to save them later on via "saveImage".

function.name: triggerImageSaving
function.desc: Notify event for selected camera to trigger the saving of the latest temporarily saved image.

function.name: setLoadOnReboot
function.desc: Configure if this module should load its saved parameters at app/device boot up.

function.name: setViewerActive
function.desc: Set status if modules UI viewer should show the images.

param.desc: Set to FALSE to save processing time if visualization is not necessary in modules UI.
param.name: status

function.name: setProcessingMode
function.desc: ProcessingMode to define processing in this app or in a other app.

function.name: setSaveAllImages
function.desc: Set if all incoming images should be saved for currently selected camera.

function.name: setImageFilePrefix
function.desc: Set prefix for filename of saved images for currently selected camera.

function.name: setImageSaveFormat
function.desc: Set format to store images with.

function.name: setImageSaveFormatCompression
function.desc: Set compression to save images (depends on format type).

function.name: getProcessingMode
function.desc: Get processing mode of currently selected camera.

function.name: setSwitchMode
function.desc: Set Switch-Mode for using multiple cameras via switch. This parameter will influence the "DeviceLinkThroughputLimit"-Parameter. + INFO: Please make sure to restart the cameras (e.g. via "restartAllCameras()" ) after adding new camera instances, so that the "DeviceLinkThroughputLimit" can be recalculated by the total amount of used cameras.

function.name: setCameraMonitoring
function.desc: Function to select if camera status should be monitored on CameraOverView UI.

function.name: cameraSpecificSoftwareTrigger
function.desc: Trigger a camera snapshot with camera selection.

function.name: disconnectCamera
function.desc: Function to disconnect currently selected camera instance (see 'setSelectedInstance').

function.name: selectGigEVisionParameterNameViaUITable
function.desc: Select GigE Vision Parameter to edit in UI.

function.name: addGigEVisionConfig
function.desc: Add preselected value to custom GigE Vision config (see "setGigEVisionParameter..." functions).

function.name: removeGigEVisionConfig
function.desc: Remove preselected value from custom GigE Vision config (see "setGigEVisionParameterName" functions).

function.name: selectGigEVisionConfigViaUITable
function.desc: Select GigE Vision parameter within custom config in UI table view (see also "removeGigEVisionConfig").

function.name: updateConfig
function.desc: Update camera config (e.g. to activate new custom GigE Vision config).

function.name: selectGigEVisionConfig
function.desc: Select config entry in table of custom GigE Vision config (see also "removeGigEVisionConfig").

function.name: getInstancesAmount
function.desc: Get amount of created remote camera instances.

function.name: addInstance
function.desc: Function to add an additional camera instance.

function.name: resetInstances
function.desc: Function to reset instances to one single camera instance. + IMPORTANT: As instances start their own threads, the module needs to be restarted if new instances are needed... (see AppEngine docu for "Script.startScript").

function.name: restartAllCameras
function.desc: Function to restart all camera instances.

function.name: setCameraModel
function.desc: Connected camera-model like Midicam2, Basler-Camera or CustomConfig. + According to the selected model it will use some predefined GigE Vision parameters. Otherwise select ' CustomConfig'.

function.name: setSelectedInstance
function.desc: Select single camera instance (first select a instance, after that other functions like "set"-function will use this camera instance).

function.name: setSWTriggerEvent
function.desc: Function to set event to trigger new image in SW mode.

function.name: setFlowConfigPriority
function.desc: Function to configure if FlowConfig should have priority for FlowConfig relevant configuration.

function.name: getStatusModuleActive
function.desc: Function to get status if module is active.

function.name: clearFlowConfigRelevantConfiguration
function.desc: Function to clear FlowConfig relevant configurations.

function.name: loadParameters
function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the CSK_PersistentData module if possible and use them.

function.name: getParameters
function.desc: Function to get all parameters of the client in JSON format.

param.desc: Number of instance to get parameters from.
param.name: instanceNo

function.name: resetModule
function.desc: Function to reset main configuration of module.

function.name: setImagePoolSize
function.desc: Function to limit the number of images which can be acquired and used at the same time

param.desc: Size of the internal image pool (default = 10).
param.name: size

function.name: stopFlowConfigRelevantProvider
function.desc: Function to stop FlowConfig relevant providers.

function.name: setSEC100HTTPClientInstance
function.desc: Function to set instance of CSK_MultiHTTPClient module to use for SEC100 camera connection.

function.name: setSEC100Username
function.desc: Function to set username to login to SEC camera.

function.name: setSEC100UserPassword
function.desc: Function to set password of user to login to SEC camera.

function.name: setSECMode
function.desc: Function to set acquisition mode of SEC camera.

function.name: setWebSocketClientInstance
function.desc: Function to set instance of WebSocket client module to use for SEC stream.

function.name: setSECStreamStatus
function.desc: Function to set status of SEC camera stream.

function.name: startSECStream
function.desc: Function to start SEC stream.

function.name: stopSECStream
function.desc: Function to stop SEC stream.

function.name: setSEC100HTTPClientInterface
function.desc: Function to set interface of HTTP client to use for SEC100 connection.

crown.name: MultiRemoteCamera_FC
crown.desc: Crown to provide CSK_FlowConfig relevant features.

event.name: OnNewImage
event.desc: Provide image acquired by camera.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

function.name: create
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig create function.

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: register
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig register function.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle
